main module¶

class main.Dados_exp(arquivo_json='workspace.json', X=[], y=[], comprimentos=None, analitos=None)¶

Base: object

Class to handle experimental data.

Attributes: arquivo_json (str): Path to the JSON file containing workspace data. X (list): List of DataFrames containing absorbance data. y (list): List of DataFrames containing reference data. comprimentos (list): List of wavelengths. analitos (list): List of analytes.

LB(plots=False)¶

Performs classical least squares analysis for the Lambert-Beer law.

Parâmetros:

plots (bool, optional) – If True, generates graphs of the results, defaults to False.

Retorna:

Tuple containing the Ks (without intercept) and Kc (with intercept) matrices.

Tipo de retorno:

tuple

PCA(plots=False)¶

Implements Principal Component Analysis (PCA) using scikit-learn.

Parâmetros:

plots (bool, optional) – If True, generates standard PCA plots, defaults to False.

Retorna:

Tuple containing eigenvectors, eigenvalues, relative variance, and cumulative variance.

Tipo de retorno:

tuple

PCA_manual(plots=False)¶

Manually implements Principal Component Analysis (PCA).

Parâmetros:

plots (bool, optional) – If True, generates standard PCA plots, defaults to False.

Retorna:

Tuple containing eigenvectors, eigenvalues, relative variance, and cumulative variance.

Tipo de retorno:

tuple

inferlib(model_matrix, error_matrix)¶

Performs inference using the libraries and calibrated models.

Parâmetros:

  • model_matrix (numpy.ndarray) – Calibrated model matrix.

  • error_matrix (numpy.ndarray) – Error matrix associated with the model.

lendo_workspace(arquivo_json)¶

Reads the workspace JSON file and returns the data.

Parâmetros:

arquivo_json (str) – Path to the JSON file.

Retorna:

Tuple containing absorbance data (X), reference data (Y), wavelengths, and analytes.

Tipo de retorno:

tuple

Levanta:

  • FileNotFoundError – If the JSON file is not found.

  • KeyError – If ‘comprimentos’ or ‘referencias’ keys are not found in the JSON file.

multicalib()¶

Performs multivariate calibration on the data.

novo_dado(X, Y=None, comprimento=None, analito=None)¶

Adds new data to the Dados_exp object.

Parâmetros:

  • X (pandas.DataFrame) – Absorbance data.

  • Y (pandas.DataFrame, optional) – Reference data, defaults to None.

  • comprimento (int, optional) – Wavelength, defaults to None.

  • analito (str, optional) – Analyte name, defaults to None.

Levanta:

ValueError – If X or Y are not DataFrames.

plot_espectros(nome='fig')¶

Plots the spectra contained in X.

Parâmetros:

nome (str, optional) – Name of the figure, defaults to “fig”.

pretreat(pretratamentos, salvar=False)¶

Applies a list of preprocessing treatments to the data.

Parâmetros:

  • pretratamentos (list) – List of tuples containing the name of the preprocessing function and its parameters.

  • salvar (bool, optional) – If True, saves the treated data and the new workspace, defaults to False.

Retorna:

A Dados_exp object with the treated DataFrame.

Tipo de retorno:

Dados_exp

salvar(nomex='X_', nomey='y_', workspace='workspace')¶

Saves X and Y values to text files and generates a new workspace.

Parâmetros:

  • nomex (str, optional) – Prefix for absorbance files (X values).

  • nomey (str, optional) – Prefix for reference files (Y values).

  • workspace (str, optional) – Name of the workspace file, defaults to “workspace”.

stack_x()¶

Stacks the absorbance data (X) into a single DataFrame.

Retorna:

DataFrame containing all absorbance values.

Tipo de retorno:

pandas.DataFrame

Levanta:

ValueError – If the list of absorbances is empty.

stack_y()¶

Stacks the reference data (Y) into a single DataFrame.

Retorna:

DataFrame containing all reference values.

Tipo de retorno:

pandas.DataFrame

Levanta:

ValueError – If the list of references is empty.

tipo_arquivo(caminho_arquivo, for_x=True)¶

Identifies and reads files based on their extension to create DataFrames.

Parâmetros:

  • caminho_arquivo (str) – Path to the file.

  • for_x (bool, optional) – If True, returns absorbance data; if False, returns reference data, defaults to True.

Retorna:

Data read from the file.

Tipo de retorno:

pandas.DataFrame

Levanta:

ValueError – If the file extension is not supported.
